thesis.move_description: Acquire 3,000 sqft commercial office space in Singapore prime district for US $3M from SF-based Single Family Office. Grade-A office play targeting Singapore's stable regulatory environment and premier commercial real estate market. Tech wealth seeking APAC diversification with income-generating asset.
thesis.expected_outcome: 5% annual rental yield with 8% annual capital appreciation, generating combined 13% gross returns. Strategic positioning in APAC's most stable jurisdiction with steady cash flow from established commercial tenant base.

control_and_rails.ips_notes: Tech-derived family office with established IPS. 15% allocation to international real estate, 10% to APAC exposure. Singapore commercial acquisition fits within mandate as APAC hedge against US tech concentration. Income-generating focus aligns with wealth preservation strategy.
